Earl's Court, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK Earl's Court Victorian Exhibition. Run in conjunction with contests on 28th May, 11th June, 25th June. Confines to bands from Northumberland, Durham, Cumberland and Westmorland. 9 bands entered, 4 competed
